archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.3.3c: c) identifying sensitive information with inadequate protection (e.g. electronic documents and emails containing passwords/passphrases in clear text; and unencrypted network designs, configuration files or security audit reports)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
